text: might be taking you in and sir joy was
onboard the ferry a truck driver who'd

he just had breakfast and gone up on the

to he all of a sudden the ship tilted
and started the singer containers
started to fall off into the sea and I

clinging on to the Henry so long day
captain I tried to save some of the

sliding on your knees around the caches

karate whoohoo my friend managed to save

I think the parents and others inside

the time my friend was holding her a

mr. choy is still haunted by the
students he couldn't save they were all
my daughter's age he said and the
